price: A ṣe ohun rere fún un nílé ayé. Àti pé ní ọ̀run dájúdájú ó máa wà nínú àwọn ẹni rere.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
